name: Steak
description: A juicy and flavorful steak cooked to perfection.

name: Beef Stew
description: A hearty stew made with tender beef chunks and a medley of vegetables.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Soft or crunchy tacos filled with seasoned ground beef and toppings.

name: Beef Curry
description: A flavorful curry dish made with tender beef and aromatic spices.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Thinly sliced beef stir-fried with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.

name: Beef Enchiladas
description: Rolled tortillas filled with seasoned beef, topped with enchilada sauce and cheese.

name: Beef Roast
description: A succulent beef roast slow-cooked with herbs and vegetables.

name: Beef Lasagna
description: Layered pasta, rich meat sauce, and creamy cheese make this classic dish.

name: Beef Pho
description: A Vietnamese noodle soup with thinly sliced beef and aromatic broth.

name: Beef Pot Pie
description: A comforting pot pie filled with tender beef chunks and vegetables.
